findings.rationale: The two-year duration may not be sufficient for certain types of confidential information, potentially exposing parties to risks of premature disclosure.
findings.evidence_quote: Confidentiality obligations shall continue for two (2) years after termination of discussions.

findings.rationale: The broad definition of confidential information may lead to ambiguity and disputes over what constitutes confidential material.
findings.evidence_quote: Confidential Information means all proprietary information disclosed by one party to the other.

findings.rationale: The absence of detailed procedures for the return or destruction of confidential information may lead to mishandling.
findings.evidence_quote: Return or destroy all Confidential Information upon request.
